content: I don't have access to specific details of how rumours influenced fleetwood mac's music-making process after its release. however, it is generally believed that the success of rumours set high standards for the band in terms of their songwriting and production. the pressure to produce another hit album may have affected their creative process and approach to making music. additionally, the band's personal and professional relationships were strained during the making of rumours, but they were able to channel those emotions into their music, which may have influenced their approach in subsequent albums.
